MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Broompark Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.36am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further fault investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:57am on Monday 29th March 2021
